script.name: !fight.defend.earth
script.description: Defends the sector earth using the torus turrets
script.sourceplaintext:
$last.voice = playing time $beenWarned = [FALSE]
$pos.MIN = $a.safezone[0] $pos.MAX = $a.safezone[1] $deviation.tolerated = $a.safezone[2]
$X.MIN = $pos.MIN[0] $X.MAX = $pos.MAX[0] $Y.MIN = $pos.MIN[1] $Y.MAX = $pos.MAX[1] $Z.MIN = $pos.MIN[2] $Z.MAX = $pos.MAX[2]
$PlayerIS = [FALSE] $time.check = playing time
while [TRUE] if is a new script version available $task = [THIS] -> get next available task: starting=98 [THIS] ->start task $task with script !fight.defend.earth and prio 99: arg1=$a.turrets arg2=$a.beacons arg3=$a.safezone arg4=null arg5=null return null end
$torus.shields = [THIS] -> get maximum shield strength [THIS] ->set current shield strength to $torus.shields
if [THIS] -> is in active sector [THIS] ->set known status to [TRUE] @ = wait randomly from 500 to 1000 ms if not $PlayerIS $inSectorTime = playing time $PlayerIS = [TRUE] *gosub SubMoveBeacons end else $beenWarned = [FALSE] $attackingPlayer = [FALSE] $PlayerIS = [FALSE] @ = wait randomly from 2500 to 3500 ms end
* find anyone who is outside the zone $ships = [SECTOR] -> get ship array from sector/ship/station skip if $ships continue $count = size of array $ships skip if $count continue
$attacklist = array alloc: size=0
while $count @ = wait 10 ms
dec $count = $chk.obj = $ships[$count] skip if $chk.obj -> exists continue skip if $chk.obj -> has same environment as [THIS] continue
* FIX (9): check for action warping $action = $chk.obj -> get current action do if $action == [ACTION_ENTER_GATE] continue do if $action == [ACTION_JUMP] continue
* FIX (10): Check if player ship is warping (IE with warp tunnel) if $chk.obj == [PLAYERSHIP] do if is player warping continue end
gosub checkTarget if $ret.outside == 2 gosub sub.DoWarning continue
else if $ret.outside == 1 if [THIS] -> is in active sector $playingTime = playing time if $chk.obj == [PLAYERSHIP] if not $attackingPlayer START speak text: page=115 id=646 priority=80 $attackingPlayer = [TRUE] @ = wait 500 ms end end append $chk.obj to array $attacklist else $chk.obj ->destroy object: killer=[THIS], show no explosion=[FALSE] end else if $chk.obj == [PLAYERSHIP] $attackingPlayer = [FALSE] $beenWarned = [FALSE] end end
@ = wait randomly from 150 to 250 ms
if size of array $attacklist $count = size of array $a.turrets while $count dec $count = $t = $a.turrets[$count][0] if $t -> exists gosub attackTarget end end end
* Rebuild Turrets every 5 minutes $time.cur = playing time if $time.cur > $time.check + 300 $time.check = $time.cur gosub SubRebuildTurrets end end return null
* checks if the target is out side of zone checkTarget: $ret.outside = 0
* dont include terran or atf ships $owner.race = $chk.obj -> get owner race
if $owner.race != Terran AND $owner.race != ATF AND $owner.race != Goner
$notoriety = get notoriety from race ATF to race $owner.race * if enemy, always fire if [THIS] -> is $chk.obj a enemy $ret.outside = 1
* check notority level else if $notoriety < 10000 $ret.outside = 1
* now check coordinates else $x = $chk.obj -> get x position $y = $chk.obj -> get y position $z = $chk.obj -> get z position
* increase deviation when OOS $deviation = $deviation.tolerated skip if $chk.obj -> is in active sector $deviation = $deviation.tolerated * 2
if $x < $X.MIN - $deviation OR $x > $X.MAX + $deviation $ret.outside = 1 else if $y < $Y.MIN - $deviation OR $y > $Y.MAX + $deviation $ret.outside = 1 else if $z < $Z.MIN - $deviation OR $z > $Z.MAX + $deviation $ret.outside = 1 else if $x < $X.MIN OR $x > $X.MAX * $ret.outside=2: ship is in warning zone, but not supposed to be killed yet $ret.outside = 2 else if $y < $Y.MIN OR $y > $Y.MAX $ret.outside = 2 else if $z < $Z.MIN OR $z > $Z.MAX $ret.outside = 2 end end end endsub
attackTarget: $i = size of array $attacklist $closestDist = 100000000 while $i @ = wait 10 ms dec $i = $chk.obj = $attacklist[$i] skip if $chk.obj -> exists continue skip if $t -> exists continue skip if $chk.obj -> has same environment as $t continue
$t ->set relation against $chk.obj to Foe $dist = get distance between $chk.obj and $t do if $chk.obj == [PLAYERSHIP] $dist = $dist - 10000 if $dist < $closestDist $closestDist = $dist $target = $chk.obj end end
if $target -> exists $t ->set attack target to $target end endsub
SubRebuildTurrets: $i = size of array $a.turrets while $i @ = wait randomly from 500 to 800 ms dec $i = $t = $a.turrets[$i][0] $x = $a.turrets[$i][1] $y = $a.turrets[$i][3] $z = $a.turrets[$i][2] $rot.a = [THIS] -> get rot alpha $rot.a = $rot.a + 32768 $rot.g = $a.turrets[$i][4] if not $t -> exists $t = create ship: type=Lasertower owner=Terran addto=[SECTOR] x=$x y=$y z=$z $t ->set homebase to [THIS] $t.pos = create new array, arguments=$x, $y, $z, null, null $t.rot = create new array, arguments=$rot.a, 0, $rot.g, null, null @ START $t -> call script !fight.torus.turret : null=null pos=$t.pos rot=$t.rot $a.turrets[$i][0] = $t end end endsub
sub.DoWarning: if $chk.obj == [PLAYERSHIP] if not $beenWarned $beenWarned = [TRUE] play sample 1129 START speak text: page=115 id=645 priority=80 $last.voice = playing time end end endsub return null
* 9: Added action check when warping out * 10: Added check for player ship using warp tunnel

line.text: is a new script version available

comment.var: find anyone who is outside the zone
FIX (10): Check if player ship is warping (IE with warp tunnel)
checks if the target is out side of zone
dont include terran or atf ships
$ret.outside=2: ship is in warning zone, but not supposed to be killed yet
9: Added action check when warping out
10: Added check for player ship using warp tunnel

sval.val: Defends the sector earth using the torus turrets
find anyone who is outside the zone
FIX (10): Check if player ship is warping (IE with warp tunnel)
checks if the target is out side of zone
dont include terran or atf ships
$ret.outside=2: ship is in warning zone, but not supposed to be killed yet
9: Added action check when warping out
10: Added check for player ship using warp tunnel
